RV. Again. He was born in Liverpool, friend. He is English. This has been said many times already - give it a rest.
As before: he is not English, and technically he might have claimed to be Scots, but I'd be happiest to make it 'British'. I must insist tho' that he is not described as English. For he 'aint!
